Translations.Text: Have We not widened for you, your chest (i.e., made your heart receptive to the Message)
and removed from you your burden (of man-created religion, traditions and Fiqh) —
that which had almost broken your back
And We exalted in your interest, Zikr ('Message') revealed unto you. (See Verse)
So, without doubt, linked with hard endeavour, is relief and ease
Surely, following hardship is relief
So whenever you became free, get attached to the ideal target (i.e., understanding, adopting and propagating Al-Kitab)
and to your Nourisher-Sustainer, then you (must) get attached
The Fig acts as a witness, and the olive (see)
and Mount Seeneen
and this Trustee City (which is protected and protects the rituals of Religion, like Salat, Tawaf, Umra, Hajj and I'tikaf)
Surely, without doubt, We created the human being in better stability and capacity (regarding choice, wisdom and understanding etc)
Thereafter We allowed him to turn lowest of the low —
excluding those who Believed and performed righteous deeds. So, for them is a reward — not interrupted (and never to be) stopped
Then what makes you deny after (knowing all these facts) the Accountability
Is not Allah the Better Judge among all who judge
Read with the Name of your Nourisher-Sustainer — That Who created
He created the human being out of a living matter attached (like a leech) hanging (from the internal surface of the womb)
Read and your Rabb is More Generous
That Who taught — with the pen
thus He taught the human being what he knew not
By no means ! Verily, the human being, indeed, transgresses the bounds
as he noticed himself that he has attained self-sufficiency (in all provisions)
Surely, unto your Nourisher-Sustainer would be the Final Return
Have you noticed him who prohibits
(My) Abd when he offered Salat
Have you pondered if (this Abd) happened to be on Al-Hudah (‘The Guidance’)
or he enjoined obedience (to One God)
Have you (ever) thought if (the other one who stopped My Abd from offering Salat), has denied and has turned away
Did he not know that Allah does see
By no means! Surely, if he did not desist, indeed We shall seize (him) by the forelock
a lying, denying, sinful forelock
Then, let him call his league (or council of helpers)
soon We call the executioners (to deal with such defiant opponents)
By no means (such an apostate will become a hurdle in the Way of Islam)! Do not obey him. And do perform prostration and become close and near (to Allah)
Verily We, We have made it descend in a night of Al-Qadr (The Destiny, Power, Majesty, Decree, Assessment, Measure)
And what made you realise what is a night of Al-Qadr
A night of Al-Qadr (proved) better than a thousand months —

continue to descend therein the angels, and Ar-Ruh (The Holy Spirit or Arch-Angel Jibriel) under permission of their Nourisher-Sustainer (transmitting all sorts of ordainments) pertaining to all matters
(It is a state of) complete Peace and serenity.This (atmosphere continues) until the time of the break of dawn

Did not become those — who have disbelieved out of Ahl-ul-Kitab as well as Al-Mushrikun, (as) Munfakkun [the people who leave aside (their illegitimate beliefs and actions)], until reaches them Al-Bayyinah —
a Messenger from Allah; he recites Suhuf (Surahs) purified and sanctified
therein (i.e., written in these Surahs are) writings — permanent (and eternal)
And ootul Kitab did not break up in groups until after what came to them as Al-Bayyinah

And they were commanded not, but that they should pay obedience to Allah as those who keep pure, unto Him the Religion (as) Unitarians; and they should establish As-Salat and they should pay-up Az-Zakat — since this (had been) the Established Religion
Verily, those who have disbelieved out of Ahl-ul-Kitab and Al-Mushrikun: (they shall enter) in the Fire of Hell (as) dwellers therein. Those people: they are evil among the creations
Verily, those who have Believed and performed righteous deeds: those people — they are better among the creations

Their reward with their Nourisher-Sustainer is Gardens of eternity — flow underneath them rivers. They will be dwellers therein forever. Allah became pleased with them, and they became pleased with Him. This achievement (suffices) for that who remained sincere to his Rabb
When the earth is shaken with its (final) earthquake
and the earth threw out its burdens
and the human being said: “What (has gone wrong) with it?”
That Day it will narrate (all the) news available with it
Because your Nourisher-Sustainer inspired unto it
That Day mankind will proceed in groups so that they may be shown their deeds
So whosoever does good of the weight of a particle, he shall see it
And whosoever does evil of the weight of a particle, he shall see it
Al-Adiyat (the spirited horses in battle-formation) running with panting breath — act as a witness (of Allah’s Majesty)
so those strihead of state sparks of fire by the bangs of their hooves
so those who make assault (in war) at dawn
so they left behind (them) as a result of that (swift run) a rising cloud of dust
so those (steeds) penetrated through that (attachead of state assault) a large collection (of the enemy force)
Verily, the human being regarding his Nourisher-Sustainer is indeed very ungrateful
although, without doubt he is over this, indeed a (self-) witness
And surely he, concerning the love for the wealth, is indeed very intense
